welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
GCommands

--- ### üìÇ | Installation ```sh npm install gcommands yarn install gcommands # Dev Build npm install Garlic-Team/GCommands#dev yarn install Garlic-Team/GCommands#dev ``` If you're updating from 4.x to 5.x, check https://gcommands.js.org/guide/guide/additional/fromv4tov5.html ### üìú | Setup ```js const { Client } = require("discord.js") const { GCommands } = require("gcommands") const client = Client(); client.on("ready", () => { const gc = new GCommands(client, { cmdDir: "commands/", eventDir: "events/", language: "english", unkownCommandMessage: false, slash: { slash: "both", prefix: "." }, database: "url" /* DB SUPPORT * redis://user:pass@localhost:6379 * mongodb://user:pass@localhost:27017/dbname * sqlite://path/to/database.sqlite * postgresql://user:pass@localhost:5432/dbname * mysql://user:pass@localhost:3306/dbname */ }) gc.on("debug", (debug)=>{console.log(debug)}) gc.on("log", (log)=>{console.log(log)}) }) client.login("bot token") ``` ### ‚úç | Examples You can find everything in the [guide](https://gcommands.js.org/guide/) and [docs](https://gcommands.js.org/docs/).
Join our [discord server](https://discord.gg/AjKJSBbGm2), if you need help or have any questions. ### üë• | Contact

methods.name: resolveFile
methods.description:
Resolves a single file into an object sendable to the API.
from djs

params.name: fileLike
params.description: Something that could be resolved to a file

classes.name: ButtonCollector
classes.description:
Collects buttons on a message.
Will automatically stop if the channel (`'channelDelete'`), guild (`'guildDelete'`) or (`'messageDelete'`) are deleted.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to be applied to this collector

methods.name: collect
methods.description: Handles a button for possible collection.

methods.name: endReason
methods.description: The reason this collector has ended with, or null if it hasn't ended yet

methods.name: _handleMessageDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the message has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'messageDelete'.

methods.name: _handleChannelDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the channel has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'channelDelete'.

methods.name: _handleGuildDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the guild has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'guildDelete'.

methods.name: key
methods.description: Gets the collector key for a button.

params.name: button
params.description: The button to get the key for

classes.name: SelectMenuCollector
classes.description:
Collects menus on a message.
Will automatically stop if the channel (`'channelDelete'`), guild (`'guildDelete'`) or (`'messageDelete'`) are deleted.

params.name: options
params.description: The options to be applied to this collector

methods.name: collect
methods.description: Handles a menu for possible collection.

methods.name: endReason
methods.description: The reason this collector has ended with, or null if it hasn't ended yet

methods.name: _handleMessageDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the message has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'messageDelete'.

methods.name: _handleChannelDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the channel has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'channelDelete'.

methods.name: _handleGuildDeletion
methods.description: Handles checking if the guild has been deleted, and if so, stops the collector with the reason 'guildDelete'.

methods.name: key
methods.description: Gets the collector key for a menu.

params.name: menu
params.description: The menu to get the key for
